title: I Become a Cat in Another World - Novel Updates
tags: Alchemy   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Demon Lord   Discrimination   Doctors   Dragons   Dungeons   Dwarfs   Elves   Enemies Become Allies   Fantasy World   Game Elements   God Protagonist   Gods   Heroes   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Pragmatic Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   S*aves   Special Abilities   Strong to Stronger   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Time Skip   Time Travel   Transported to Another World

description:
When I died of pancreatic cancer and moved to another world, I was transmigrated as a fat cat due to the goddess' mistake.

I stay in the surrounding forest, sometimes I visit the inns in the town and lived a comfortable life.>
